{{Flavour|The scaly skin of a cold-breathing dragon. It can be fashioned into proper armour, but even in its raw form it provides great protection from the effects of cold but renders its wearer susceptible to fire.}}

'''Ice dragon hide''' is not a very impressive form of body armour on its own. With 4 [[AC]] and 11 [[encumbrance rating]], it is inconvenient for most casters, and provides meager physical defense. However, it does provide two ranks of [[cold]] resistance (though with a rank of [[fire]] vulnerability) and can be upgraded to a much more impressive [[ice dragon armour]] by using a [[scroll of enchant armour]] on it.

Although rare, you can make your own ice dragon hides by [[butchering]] [[ice dragon]] [[corpse]]s.

==History==
Ice dragon hides were removed in [[0.19]]
